articles.content: Let’s talk about Crucible‘s launch. Amazon’s hero shooter landed on Steam earlier this week, and honestly? It was a bit of a mess. In fairness, a lot of brand new online games face similar issues to … [+2524 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft: Beware this massive phishing campaign using malicious Excel macros to hack PCs - ZDNet
articles.description: Hundreds of different Excel files have been used to trick PC users into installing a remote access tool that attackers can use to control their machine.
